DOC.brief_summary: The aim study asses oncological safety oncoplastic breast surgery , impact patient satisfaction worthy general breast surgeon learn different oncoplastic technique .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Oncoplastic Breast Surgery Oncological Safety Patient Satisfaction
DOC.detailed_description: This non randomize prospective trial conduct 70 female patient present tertiary referral breast unit -Ain Shams University hospital non metastatic breast cancer period September 2012 September 2013 . All sign inform consent share study approve ethical committee hold April 2012 - Ain Shams University . Our patient divide 2 equal group : group A ( 35patients ) underwent standard quadrantectomy , group B ( 35 patient ) underwent oncoplastic surgery . In group A quadrantectomies do general breast surgeon group B oncoplastic procedure do well trained oncoplastic breast surgeon assist plastic surgeon . The following data report case include : age , family history , tumor size , volume weight specimen , location tumor , margin length , ( primary tumor , regional node , metastasis ) staging , molecular subtype patient satisfaction .
DOC.criteria: Stage 1 , 2 breast cancer Non metastatic breast caner Singing inform consent Metastatic breast cancer Stage 3 , 4 breast cancer Inflammatory breast cancer Multicentric/multifocal disease Ductal carcinoma situ Patients old 60 year History breast surgery oncoplastic group Comorbidity oncoplastic group Patients 60 year old
